101654.「うむっ 結構！ ワシは バトルロードを\n こよなく愛し 出場者を支援する……:
Mmm, fine! I love the Battle Roads and I support the contestants. Or as I like to call myself, Grandpa Badge. Hmm? I don't know
where I've seen you before. I'm sorry? It's just my imagination. It's not like he's sneaking around with the Minister to avoid
detection! That's not the point! You've got a badge of honor from the Battle Roads, don't you? I love Battle Roads so much that I'm
giving away some of my most prized badges to young, upcoming contestants. But... Not for free! I'll trade you your spare badges. If
you'd like to trade badges with me, just give me a call...

101655.「むむっ！？ なんじゃ おぬし\n まだ バトルロードに参加しておらんな？\n:

lies, you know!
